price: 74. En zij hebben naast Allah valse goden aangenomen, hopende dat zij door hen geholpen worden.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan laʿallahum yunṣarūna
